message.content:
Out of the following variants, which is your favorite?:

{"a":"(Verse 1)  
Yo, check it, I’m coding with precision,  
Type-level programming, that’s my mission.  
In the TypeScript realm, where the types collide,  
We’re crafting clean code, let’s take it for a ride.  

Generics in the game, we keep it versatile,  
Interfaces on deck, yeah, we do it with style.  
From `T` to `U`, we’re mapping it right,  
Type inference so smooth, it’s a coder’s delight.  

(Chorus)  
Type-level vibes, we’re coding with flair,  
In the TypeScript zone, we’re beyond compare.  
Static checks in place, no runtime fright,  
Type-level programming, we’re shining so bright.  

(Verse 2)  
Union types flex, they’re the ultimate blend,  
Combining all the options, we set the trend.  
Literal types precise, no room for mistakes,  
With every line we write, we’re raising the stakes.  

Conditional types, we’re making it clear,  
If `A` then `B`, we’ve got nothing to fear.  
Mapped types in the mix, transforming the flow,  
With every type we define, we’re ready to grow.  

(Chorus)  
Type-level vibes, we’re coding with flair,  
In the TypeScript zone, we’re beyond compare.  
Static checks in place, no runtime fright,  
Type-level programming, we’re shining so bright.  

(Bridge)  
From `Pick` to `Omit`, we’re slicing it clean,  
Type utilities, you know what I mean.  
Composition’s the key, stacking it right,  
With every type we define, we’re reaching new heights.  

(Verse 3)  
So let’s raise a glass to the types that we write,  
In the TypeScript universe, we’re taking flight.  
With every function call, we’re keeping it strong,  
Type-level programming, come join the throng.  

(Outro)  
If you’re in the game and you wanna be smart,  
Dive into TypeScript, let’s make it an art.  
With types on our side, we’ll conquer the night,  
Type-level programming, we’re ready to ignite!","b":"(Verse 1)  
Yo, let’s break it down, I’m coding with flair,  
Type-level programming, we’re takin’ it there.  
In the TypeScript realm, where the types come alive,  
We’re crafting our logic, watch our code thrive.  

Generics in the mix, keepin’ it tight,  
Interfaces on deck, we’re doin’ it right.  
From `T` to `U`, we’re mapping the flow,  
Type inference so smooth, it’s a pro’s show.  

(Chorus)  
Type-level vibes, we’re coding with pride,  
In the TypeScript world, we take it in stride.  
Static checks in place, no runtime fright,  
Type-level programming, we’re shining so bright.  

(Verse 2)  
Union types flex, they’re versatile tools,  
Combining all options, we’re breaking the rules.  
Literal types precise, no room for the guess,  
With every line written, we’re aiming for success.  

Conditional types, we’re makin’ it clear,  
If `A` then `B`, we got nothing to fear.  
Mapped types on the rise, transforming the game,  
With every type we define, we’re building our name.  

(Chorus)  
Type-level vibes, we’re coding with pride,  
In the TypeScript world, we take it in stride.  
Static checks in place, no runtime fright,  
Type-level programming, we’re shining so bright.  

(Bridge)  
From `Pick` to `Omit`, we’re slicing it clean,  
Type utilities, you know what I mean.  
Composition’s the key, stacking it right,  
With every type we define, we’re reaching new heights.  

(Verse 3)  
So let’s raise a toast to the types that we write,  
In the TypeScript universe, we’re taking flight.  
With every function call, we’re keeping it strong,  
Type-level programming, come join the throng.  

(Outro)  
So if you’re in the game and you wanna be smart,  
Dive into TypeScript, let’s make it an art.  
With types on our side, we’ll conquer the night,  
Type-level programming, we’re ready to ignite!","c":"(Verse 1)  
Yo, check it, I’m coding with precision,  
Type-level programming, that’s my mission.  
In the TypeScript realm, where the types collide,  
We’re crafting clean code, let our logic guide.  

Generics in the game, we keep it versatile,  
Interfaces flexin’, yeah, we do it with style.  
From `T` to `U`, we’re mapping it right,  
Type inference so smooth, it’s a coder’s delight.  

(Chorus)  
Type-level vibes, we’re coding with pride,  
In the TypeScript world, we take it in stride.  
Static checks in place, no runtime fright,  
Type-level programming, we’re shining so bright.  

(Verse 2)  
Union types, man, they’re the real deal,  
Combining all options, that’s how we feel.  
Literal types keep our values in check,  
No more guesswork, we’re cashing that check.  

Conditional types, we’re making it clear,  
If `A` then `B`, we’ve got nothing to fear.  
Mapped types on the rise, transforming the game,  
With every line of code, we’re building our name.  

(Chorus)  
Type-level vibes, we’re coding with pride,  
In the TypeScript world, we take it in stride.  
Static checks in place, no runtime fright,  
Type-level programming, we’re shining so bright.  

(Bridge)  
From `Pick` to `Omit`, we’re slicing it clean,  
Type utilities, you know what I mean.  
Composition’s the key, stacking it right,  
With every type we define, we’re reaching new heights.  

(Verse 3)  
So let’s raise a glass to the types that we write,  
In the TypeScript universe, we’re taking flight.  
With every function call, we’re keeping it strong,  
Type-level programming, come join the throng.  

(Outro)  
So if you’re in the game and you wanna be smart,  
Dive into TypeScript, let’s make it an art.  
With types on our side, we’ll conquer the night,  
Type-level programming, we’re ready to ignite!"}
